import React, { useContext } from 'react' import productContext from '../../Context/ProductContext' import { BsBag } from 'react-icons/bs' import { AiOutlineClose } from 'react-icons/ai' import './Cart.css' export default function Cart() { const contextData = useContext(productContext) return ( <> {contextData.userCart(product =>(

Bag { contextData.setIsShowCart(false) }} />

{title}

{price}$


Buy More Information

{count}

))} ) }
